about_the_game:
Many Roads to Power - A Crusader Kings III Digital Comic Book


Dive into the epic world of Crusader Kings III with 'Many Roads to Power', a free digital comic book. This 10-page digital comic from Dead Good Comics and Paradox Interactive tells the captivating story of Basil I the Macedonian and his dramatic rise to power to become one of the greatest emperors in Byzantine history.

Once downloaded, you can access the ‘Many Roads to Power’ comic book in the game files through either Steam's "Browse local files" functionality or your operating system file browser.

['Many Roads to Power' is a 10-page digital comic book produced and published by Dead Good Comics in collaboration with Paradox Interactive and the Crusader Kings III team].

Once downloaded, you can access the ‘Many Roads to Power’ comic book in the game files through either Steam's "Browse local files" functionality or your operating system file browser.

['Many Roads to Power' is a 10-page digital comic book produced and published by Dead Good Comics in collaboration with Paradox Interactive and the Crusader Kings III team].
